Html:
Hi,

I'm using the BibWord and I'm trying to make my own style. One problem that I have encountered is that I can't get the auto hyphenation working within the bibliography field. Is there a way to correct this somehow?

Not sure, but I doubt that is possible.

The bibliography is HTML which gets converted to Open XML by Word. I'm not aware of any automatic hyphenation options in HTML sort of manually providing soft hyphens in your source.

I'm not even sure whether automatic hyphenation works in fields in Word.
Thanks for the quick reply. I guess Iâ€™ll have to do it manually then.
